title: How does your garden grow?
creator_credit: George Cass, Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Kevin Heinze shows young students various aspects of gardening using simple techniques suitable for the classroom. Topics covered in this 5 part series are: 1) Sowing seeds; 2) Propagating plants; 3) Potting up; 4) Carnivorous plants; 5) Arbor Week.
creator_credit_for_label: George Cass, Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch and TV Ed Productions
